channel.title: CVE Feed for Patrick Posner -- Filr – Secure document library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Patrick Posner -- Filr – Secure document library

item.title: CVE-2024-43216|2024-08-12T21:38:41.165Z -- patrick%20posner -- filr%20%E2%80%93%20secure%20document%20library
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Patrick Posner Filr – Secure document library allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Filr – Secure document library: from n/a through 1.2.4.
